```{r}
# pick the patient
patient <- "Patient_02"
```

```{r}
# load integrated dataset (replicates + timepoints. harmony)
data <- readRDS(paste0(data.dir, "inputdata/", patient, "_SCR_C02_harmony_integrated_TCR_01-12-2023.2.rds"))
```

```{r}
# preprocess
data <- data %>%
  NormalizeData() %>% 
  FindVariableFeatures(nfeatures = 3000) %>%
  ScaleData() %>%
  RunPCA()
data <- RunHarmony(data, group.by.vars = "project")
data <- data %>%
  RunUMAP(reduction = "harmony", dims = 1:25) %>%
  FindNeighbors(reduction = "harmony", dims = 1:25) %>%
  FindClusters()
```


```{r}
# plot integration
sample.colors <- c("#FF6633","#FFCC00", "#CC99FF", "#6600CC")
int.plot <- DimPlot(data, group.by = "sample") + 
  scale_color_manual(labels = c("CO2.1", "C02.2", "SCR.1", "SCR.2"), values=sample.colors)
int.plot
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
# clustering
resolutions <- c(0.1, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1, 1.2, 1.4, 1.5, 1.6, 1.8, 2, 2.2, 2.4, 2.6, 2.7, 2.8, 3)
for (res in resolutions){
  data <- FindClusters(data, resolution = res) %>%
    AddMetaData(metadata = Idents(data), col.name = paste0("cluster_res", res))
}
```


```{r}
# map basic cell type markers #

markers.1 <- c("PTPRC",  # immune
               "CD3E",   # T cells
               "CD4",    # T CD4+ 
               "CD8A",   # T CD8+
               "KLRF1",  # NK 
               "MS4A1",  # B cells
               "CD79A",  # plasma
               "LILRA4", # pDCs
               "CD68",   # Myeloid
               "TPSAB1", # mast
               "EPCAM",  # tumor
               "CLDN5",  # endothelial
               "COL1A1", # CAFs
               "ALB"     # hepatocytes
               
)
marker.labels.1 <- c("Immune", "T cells", "T CD4+", "T CD8+", "NK", "B Cells", 
                     "Plasma cells", "pDCs", "Myeloid", "Mast", 
                     "Tumor", "Endothelial", "CAFs", "Hepatocytes")

marker.colors <- c("Classic Area Red","Classic Red", "Classic Red", "Classic Red", "Classic Orange", "Classic Green", "Classic Green", "Blue-Teal", "Classic Blue", "Classic Blue", "Classic Gray", "Orange Light", "Brown", "Purple")

fplots.1 <- lapply(1:length(markers.1), function(x){
  feature <- markers.1[x]
  plot_title <- paste(feature, marker.labels.1[x], sep = " - ")
  FeaturePlot(object = data, reduction = "umap", features = feature) +
    labs(title = plot_title, x = "UMAP 1", y = "UMAP 2") +
    scale_colour_gradientn(colours = paletteer_c(paste0("ggthemes::", marker.colors[x]), 13)) + 
    #scale_colour_gradientn(colours = brewer.pal(n = 7, name = "Greens")) +
    theme(legend.position = "none",
          axis.text.x=element_blank(),
          axis.ticks.x=element_blank(),
          axis.title.x=element_blank(),
          axis.text.y=element_blank(),
          axis.ticks.y=element_blank(),
          axis.title.y=element_blank(),)
})

all.fplots1 <- do.call("grid.arrange", c(fplots.1, ncol = 4))
```

```{r}
# save markers plots
ggsave(filename = paste0(work.dir, "figures/", patient, "/", patient, "_SCR_CO2_markers_mapping.tiff"), plot = all.fplots1, device = "tiff", width = 12, height = 7, dpi = 600)
```

## TCR 

```{r eval = FALSE}
S1 <- read.csv(paste0(proj.dir, "data/SERPENTINE_06_07/jobs/SPE_1_02_SCR_A_FRESH_1/SPE_1_02_SCR_A_FRESH_1/outs/per_sample_outs/SPE_1_02_SCR_A_FRESH_1/vdj_t/filtered_contig_annotations.csv"))
S2 <- read.csv(paste0(proj.dir,"data/SERPENTINE_10_11/jobs/SPE_1_02_C02_A_FRESH_1/SPE_1_02_C02_A_FRESH_1/outs/per_sample_outs/SPE_1_02_C02_A_FRESH_1/vdj_t/filtered_contig_annotations.csv"))
S3 <- read.csv(paste0(proj.dir,"data/SERPENTINE_06_07/jobs/SPE_1_02_SCR_A_FRESH_2/SPE_1_02_SCR_A_FRESH_2/outs/per_sample_outs/SPE_1_02_SCR_A_FRESH_2/vdj_t/filtered_contig_annotations.csv"))
S4 <- read.csv(paste0(proj.dir,"data/SERPENTINE_10_11/jobs/SPE_1_02_C02_A_FRESH_2/SPE_1_02_C02_A_FRESH_2/outs/per_sample_outs/SPE_1_02_C02_A_FRESH_2/vdj_t/filtered_contig_annotations.csv"))

contig_list_TCR <- list(S1, S2, S3, S4)

# TCR
combined_tcr <- combineTCR(contig_list_TCR, 
                ID = c("SPE_1_02_SCR_A_FRESH_1", "SPE_1_02_C02_A_FRESH_1", "SPE_1_02_SCR_A_FRESH_2", "SPE_1_02_C02_A_FRESH_2"), 
                samples = c("SERPENTINE_06_07", "SERPENTINE_10_11", "SERPENTINE_06_07", "SERPENTINE_10_11")
                )

# rename to match sc
combined_tcr$SERPENTINE_06_07_SPE_1_02_SCR_A_FRESH_1$barcode <- str_remove_all(combined_tcr$SERPENTINE_06_07_SPE_1_02_SCR_A_FRESH_1$barcode, pattern = "-1$|-2$|-3$")
combined_tcr$SERPENTINE_10_11_SPE_1_02_C02_A_FRESH_1$barcode <- str_remove_all(combined_tcr$SERPENTINE_10_11_SPE_1_02_C02_A_FRESH_1$barcode, pattern = "-1$|-2$|-3$")
combined_tcr$SERPENTINE_06_07_SPE_1_02_SCR_A_FRESH_2$barcode <- str_remove_all(combined_tcr$SERPENTINE_06_07_SPE_1_02_SCR_A_FRESH_2$barcode, pattern = "-1$|-2$|-3$")
combined_tcr$SERPENTINE_10_11_SPE_1_02_C02_A_FRESH_2$barcode <- str_remove_all(combined_tcr$SERPENTINE_10_11_SPE_1_02_C02_A_FRESH_2$barcode, pattern = "-1$|-2$|-3$")

data <- combineExpression(
  combined_tcr, 
  data, 
  chain = "both",
  cloneCall="aa", 
  proportion = FALSE, 
  cloneSize=c(Single=1, Small=5, Medium=20, Large=50, Hyperexpanded=100))
```
